snippet.title: In Sound Mind – Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
In Sound Mind launches in 2021 on PlayStation 5, Xbox Series X, and PC. Play the demo now: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1119980/In_Sound_Mind/?utm_source=modus&utm_medium=youtube&utm_campaign=announce   

In Sound Mind is a witty first-person psychological horror game from the creators of Nightmare House 2 with frenetic puzzles, unique boss fights, and original music by The Living Tombstone. Explore and fight through a series of unsettling memories as you journey within the inner workings of the one place you can’t seem to escape—your own mind. 

Learn more here: https://modusgames.com/in-sound-mind/?utm_source=youtube&utm_medium=organic&utm_campaign=announcement%20trailer
Follow Us on Twitter: https://modus.games/twitter   
Like Us on Facebook: https://modus.games/facebook   
Join our Discord: https://modus.games/discord
